country.country_description: A vibrant and diverse planet located in the Gamma Quadrant
country.people_description: Kor-Terra is home to a variety of species, all of whom live in harmony and mutual respect.
country.language_description: Kor-Terrean is a beautiful and complex language that is composed of a combination of spoken words and gestures.
